summary: Integrated Phase 6.9 postmortem into documentation. File created at /docs/release_notes/PHASE_6.9_POSTMORTEM.md, link added to docs/RELEASE_NOTES.md, and task marked complete in /TASK_CARDS.md.

content.details: Created three MCP-compliant YAML plan templates and integrated them into the bluelabel new-plan command. Templates: basic-single-agent, multi-agent-dag, approval-gated-flow. CLI now supports --template flag for new-plan. All templates pass lint. See TASK_CARDS.md for details.

Added --dry-run and --summary flags to bluelabel run. Dry-run mode outputs execution order, DAG layers, agent routing, approvals/blockers. Summary mode gives one-liner per task. Tested with linear, parallel, diamond, approval-gated, and multi-agent plans. Cycles and missing dependencies flagged. No agent execution in dry-run. See TASK_CARDS.md for details.
